I love CS and its community despite the toxicity and how bad I am at the game. You will of course bump into the occasional troll/smurf/hacker but the vast majority of my experiences have been positive and most players I bump into are willing to laugh and joke. This is best played with friends. Easy to learn, difficult to master, you'll have most fun at Nova Rank. Prime is worth the upgrade.
I would like this game even more if it there were less cheaters but I still love it, I guess....
